meanings.definition: The state or quality of being without limits or boundaries.
meanings.sent1: The limitlessness of the ocean amazed the children as they gazed at its vastness.
meanings.sent2: The concept of limitlessness in space exploration fuels our curiosity about the unknown.
meanings.sent3: The limitlessness of the buffet left the guests wondering if they could try every dish.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination soared with the limitlessness of possibilities that lay ahead.
meanings.sent5: The artist's canvas reflected the limitlessness of her creativity.

meanings.definition: The condition of having no restrictions or constraints.
meanings.sent1: The limitlessness of the desert seemed to stretch endlessly under the scorching sun.
meanings.sent2: In a world of limitlessness, one must still navigate the boundaries of morality.
meanings.sent3: The limitlessness of the playground made it a favorite spot for the children to play freely.
meanings.sent4: His ambition knew no limitlessness, driving him to achieve great success.
meanings.sent5: The limitlessness of time was both a gift and a burden for the immortal being.
